languages.text: {n}Огромный кибермастиф немедленно перестает скалиться в вашу сторону и замирает у ног хозяина. Только кровь густыми каплями падает с металлических клыков.{/n}

{n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Огромный кибермастиф немедленно перестает скалиться в вашу сторону и замирает у ног хозяина. Только кровь густыми каплями падает с металлических клыков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes still at its master's foot, with the only exception being the blood dripping in thick drops from its metal fangs.{/n}
{n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes still at its master's foot, with the only exception being the blood dripping in thick drops from its metal fangs.{/n}

{n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

{n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

{n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

{n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der riesige Cyber-Mastiff hört augenblicklich auf, in deine Richtung zu knurren, und folgt lautlos seinem Herrn. Die Stille wird nur von den schweren Blutstropfen unterbrochen, die von seinen metallenen Lefzen tropfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der riesige Cyber-Mastiff hört augenblicklich auf, in deine Richtung zu knurren, und folgt lautlos seinem Herrn. Die Stille wird nur von den schweren Blutstropfen unterbrochen, die von seinen metallenen Lefzen tropfen.

languages.text: {n}L'imposant cyber-mastiff cesse immédiatement de grogner dans votre direction et s'assied calmement aux pieds de son maître, tandis que d'épais globules de sang dégoulinent de ses crocs métalliques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'imposant cyber-mastiff cesse immédiatement de grogner dans votre direction et s'assied calmement aux pieds de son maître, tandis que d'épais globules de sang dégoulinent de ses crocs métalliques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El enorme cibermastín deja de gruñir inmediatamente en tu dirección y guarda silencio a los pies de su amo; su postura hierática contrasta con los gruesos goterones de sangre que se desprenden de sus fauces metálicas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El enorme cibermastín deja de gruñir inmediatamente en tu dirección y guarda silencio a los pies de su amo; su postura hierática contrasta con los gruesos goterones de sangre que se desprenden de sus fauces metálicas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到这句话，他身边那只壮硕的生化獒犬立刻止住了咆哮，安静地蹲坐在主人脚边。粘稠的血液从它的金属尖牙上滴落，打破了周围的寂静。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这句话，他身边那只壮硕的生化獒犬立刻止住了咆哮，安静地蹲坐在主人脚边。粘稠的血液从它的金属尖牙上滴落，打破了周围的寂静。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大なサイバーマスチフは、あなたに向けて唸るのを即座にやめ、主人の足元でおとなしくなった。その静寂を破るのは、金属の牙から濃い血のしずくが滴り落ちる音のみだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大なサイバーマスチフは、あなたに向けて唸るのを即座にやめ、主人の足元でおとなしくなった。その静寂を破るのは、金属の牙から濃い血のしずくが滴り落ちる音のみだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devasa siber mastif anında sana hırlamayı kesiyor. Efendisinin ayağının dibinde sessizleşiyor. Metal dişlerinden damlayan kan zerreleri dışında hiçbir harekette bulunmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The huge cyber-mastiff immediately stops snarling in your direction and goes quiet at its master's foot, its stillness punctuated only by the thick globules of blood dripping from its metal fangs.{/n}
